alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 6:39PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lafayette and southeastern St. Landry Parishes through 715 PM CDT... At 639 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sunset, or near Carencro, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Leonville, Arnaudville, Sunset, Grand Coteau and Cankton. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 7 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin
